attributes.action: put a cap on all Mp`s pay rises/reviews for the next 3 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel  all MP`s pay reviews/rewards to be put on hold for at least 3 years. As in light of current performances and the disgusting amount of waste of taxpayers money .
Their  performance does not justify any such raise.
